title: Inkscapetober Day 15: Helmet
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 15:** Helmet
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image WhiteGuard.png]]


**Subject:** WhiteGuard

**Commentary:** WhiteGuard is a (chess) knight. most famously known for being the interviewer of many interesting persons on this wiki. These elements are both featured on the shield. The background of the shield further enhances the chess theme. As a supporter I have chosen a white knight, or a white guard one could say.

**How the prompt fits in:** The knight/guard supporter has a helmet. Up until yesterday I had this one planned out with a different, harder to realise prompt. But then I decided it was a good idea to swap those around and leave the more difficult prompt to something else.
@@ @@
